profile_photo.name: REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT IN BUENOS AIRES
profile_photo.position: Final work of EANT - Data Scientist career

profile_about.title: Introduction
profile_about.paragraph_1: If I had to buy a department as an investment, where would I do it?
profile_about.paragraph_2: The main idea of the work will be to predict the location of the property in which the greatest increase in the price will be obtained, for the following year, based on the recognition of the variables that determine that the increase is greater than a defined threshold.
profile_about.paragraph_3: The threshold is defined as the 90th percentile.

profile_base.title: Databases
profile_base.paragraph_1: The databases were obtained from the Government of the City of Buenos Aires website and are the following:
profile_base.paragraph_2:
- Departments for sale of Buenos aires city during the years 2007 - 2015
- Private Health Centers
- Health Centers and Community Action
- Medical Centers Neighborhoods
- Police stations
- Educational establishments
- Subway stations
- Metrobus stations
- Railway stations
- Clubs
- Hospitals
- Barracks and police fire stations
- Bus stops
- Cultural dependencies
- Pharmacies
- Universities

profile_preprouno.title: Procesamiento
profile_preprouno.paragraph_1: The threshold is defined as the 90th percentile.
profile_preprouno.paragraph_2: The threshold is defined as the 90th percentile.
